I have received a reply from the Rt Hon Simon Burns MP who is also the Minister of State for Health.
"Furthermore, the Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affair's Chief Scientific Adviser, Bob Watson, has asked to receive regular updates on developments and new research in this area. The UK has a robust system for assessing risks from pesticides and at present all evidence shows neonicotinoids do not pose an unacceptable risk when products are used correctly. Ministers will not hesitate to Act however if presented with any new evidence."
Hm...
